name: Monrovia
shortDescription: A historic city in the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains, known for its charming downtown and community spirit.
fullDescription: Monrovia offers a welcoming small-town atmosphere with a vibrant historic downtown featuring unique shops, restaurants, and community events. Nestled against the San Gabriel Mountains, the city provides easy access to hiking trails, parks, and outdoor recreation. With excellent schools and a tight-knit community, Monrovia appeals to families and professionals seeking a balanced lifestyle close to Los Angeles.
heroImageAlt: Downtown Monrovia street with shops and trees

neighborhoods.name: Arcadia
neighborhoods.description: Known for its scenic parks, the Santa Anita Race Track, and family-friendly neighborhoods.

neighborhoods.name: Bradbury
neighborhoods.description: A small, upscale community with large estates and quiet surroundings.

neighborhoods.name: Duarte
neighborhoods.description: Suburban city with parks, hiking trails, and a community-focused lifestyle.

neighborhoods.name: Pasadena
neighborhoods.description: Cultural and historic city known for the Rose Parade and vibrant arts scene.

highlights.title: Monrovia Old Town
highlights.description: Historic downtown area with shops, dining, and community events.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Monrovia Old Town street with shops

highlights.title: Hiking in the San Gabriel Mountains
highlights.description: Access to popular trails offering beautiful views and outdoor activities.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Trail view in the San Gabriel Mountains

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Farmers markets, festivals, and local gatherings strengthen community ties.

highlights.title: Monrovia Canyon Park
highlights.description: A nature preserve with walking trails, waterfalls, and picnic areas.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Waterfall and trees in Monrovia Canyon Park

faqs.question: What is Monrovia known for?
faqs.answer: Monrovia is known for its historic downtown, outdoor recreation, and family-friendly community.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Monrovia?
faqs.answer: Monrovia offers a balanced market with options from historic homes to modern residences.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are popular in Monrovia?
faqs.answer: Hiking in the San Gabriel Mountains and visiting Monrovia Canyon Park are popular outdoor activities.

faqs.question: Is Monrovia convenient for commuting?
faqs.answer: Yes, Monrovia is served by the Foothill Freeway (I-210) and Metro Gold Line, offering easy access to Pasadena and Downtown LA.
